original_title: How to Fill a Wild Wet T-shirt
overview: More frivolity. More Fun and even more bodies to behold! "The Girls of Spring Break" are back to warm you up on a cold winter's night. Find out why the girls do it. Find out why the guys love it. Find out why the 1986 Spring Break was the wildest week in the history of Ft. Lauderdale.
tagline: Just when you thought it was safe to go back to Ft. Lauderdale.
title: How to Fill a Wild Wet T-shirt
